List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIGeometricAggregateAbstract class is an aggregate Geometry (abstract) type. GisIGeometricAggregateAbstract is a single Geometry that is a collection of other geometries. There is no requirement that the geometries interact spatially. Non-abstract derived types should have at least one accessor that returns objects of the appropriate contained type.
